latest.description: A string representing the latest available version of the app.

versions.description: An object containing data for each version of the app.

*.description: An object containing data for a specific version of the app.

title.description: A string representing the title of the version of the app.

remarks.description: An array of strings representing remarks, separated by newlines.

files.description: An array of strings representing the files included in the version of the app.

databases.description: An array of objects representing the available databases.

name.description: A string representing the name of the database.

content_type.description: A string representing the content type of the database.

fetch_type.description: A string representing the fetch type of the database.

local_path.description: A string representing the local path of the database. Used only when fetch_type is 'local'.

api_url.description: A string representing the API URL of the database. Used only when fetch_type is 'api'.
